name: Marble Side Table, Brown
description: Luxury meets functionality with the Marble Side Table Brown. The piece seamlessly combines rich walnut-stained wood and natural brown marble. The solid brown marble base features intricate veining with white and natural tones throughout, crafted into a contemporary cylinder. The sleek pole and circular tabletop are made from FSC certified Ash Wood, stained in walnut color to complement the marble base. The slim silhouette and natural materials create a chic, timeless side table.
